professional_summary: Automation Developer with hands-on experience in agentic AI systems, AI-driven process automation, and LLM orchestration using Python. Skilled in building and deploying AI agents, integrating with frameworks like LangChain, and designing intelligent automation workflows. Experienced in full-stack development with JavaScript/TypeScript, containerization with Docker, and working in collaborative, agile environments. Proven ability to deliver scalable solutions through technical innovation and cross-functional collaboration.
cv_job_experience:
August 2025 - Present
Self-Directed Projects & AI/Agentic Automation Development and Cybersecurity
  • Developed an AI-powered study assistant using LangChain, integrating with Anki to automate flashcard creation and learning workflows.
  • Built multiple agentic automation workflows demonstrating LLM orchestration and context-aware task execution in real-world applications.
  • Practicing in cybersecurity labs and preparing for advanced certifications (CPTS/OSCP), with hands-on experience in web exploitation and secure system design.

January 2023 - August 2025
Software Developer & Support Manager, Digia Finland Oy
  • Designed, developed, and deployed full RPA automation solutions using Python and automation frameworks, delivering 3–5 projects annually with measurable efficiency improvements.
  • Maintained and enhanced a large-scale enterprise file transfer/transform system (project value €500,000+), ensuring data integrity and protection of sensitive information.
  • Collaborated with technical and business teams to refine automation logic, integrate APIs and databases, and improve system scalability.
  • Led knowledge-sharing sessions and supported citizen developers in adopting automation tools and best practices.
  • Rebuilt and managed client relationships, securing new contracts through technical proposals and solution demonstrations.

May 2017 - August 2021 (Summers while studying for B.Sc. in Mech. Eng.)
Mechanical Engineering Trainee, Wärtsilä Oy
  • Conducted engineering calculations and system tuning for engine projects.
  • Managed technical documentation and supported installation and calibration tasks across international client deployments.

Leadership Experience
Finnish Army Reserves (Dragsviikin Maakuntajoukkue)
  • Led a platoon of 30 personnel, managing training, logistics, and operations under high-pressure conditions.
  • Developed strategic thinking, teamwork, and problem-solving skills applicable to cross-functional technical teams.
skills:
• RPA & Automation and scripting: Python, UiPath (familiar), Selenium, PyAutoGUI, LangChain, N8N, Bash
• AI & Automation: AI agents, agentic automation, process optimization, LangChain, Huggingface, Ollama, LangGraph, multi-agent system architecture, RAG, vector databases
• Software Development: JavaScript/TypeScript (Fullstack), Docker
• Data & Systems: Pandas, OpenPyXL, SQL, Microsoft Azure, AWS, PyPDF2
• Cybersecurity & Networking: CompTIA Network+, Security+, Pentest+, HTB Certified Web Exploitation Specialist (CWES)
• Familiar technologies and keywords: APIs, backend, frontend, version control, prompt engineering, asynchronous programming
key_achievements:
• Delivered multiple full-cycle automation projects with measurable efficiency gains through AI-driven workflows.
• Mentored citizen developers in adopting automation tools and best practices.
• Proactively developed and tested agentic workflows for personal productivity, including automated note rewriting, flashcard generation, and analytical tasks using LLM orchestration.
• Demonstrated ability to design and implement context-aware automation using LangChain and AI agent frameworks.
